display_long_description:
Run, climb, and jump in VR using a unique locomotion method that only needs the movement of your hands and arms. No buttons, no sticks, no teleportation. Push off of surfaces to jump and squeeze them with both hands to climb.

Monki Business provides two Gamemodes.
Casual - No Tagging, just casually play the game with others in a Public or Private!
Lava Tag - Play Tag back and forth with two players, or play infection with up to 3 or more players! This works for both Public and Privates

Run from the other Monkies, or outmaneuver the survivors to Tag them. Parkour up trees and cliff faces to avoid and chase other Monkies down. Hang out in a virtual jungle with randos or group up in a private room with friends to hang out and play. The stakes are low, so feel free to just chat or make up your own games. The movement is easy to learn, and hard to master.

Visit our store in the Monki Shop, with a rotating inventory of items to buy, play with, and wear to express your true Monki.

Return to Monki.


Terms and Service & Privacy Policy are listed below:

Terms of Service: https://sites.google.com/view/monkibusiness/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/monkibusiness/privacy-policy
